mapper.insert: insert into wishlist (user_id, food_seq, wish_or_not) select #{user_id}, #{food_seq}, 'YES' from dual where not exists (select * from wishlist where wish_or_not='YES' and user_id=#{user_id} and food_seq=#{food_seq})
mapper.update: update wishlist set wish_or_not = NULL where wish_or_not = 'YES' and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select f.* from food f, wishlist w where f.food_seq = w.food_seq and w.wish_or_not = 'YES'
